Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Qhaabiil isi toobokoytat abeh yan Qidimih Sabbatah israa-iil xaylol, diggah Sabab maliinoh Nafsi Qide num hinnay umaanet Baaxó baysa num, toysa woo num cagalah Sinam inkih Qideh gide iyyaanam keenil madaqne, Yalli Qidim kak caraamu abe nafsih Qidimik isi waase num, toysa usuk cagalah Sinam inkih Rabak wadeh gide iyyaanam keenil madaqne, Nummah israa-iil xayloh Ni-farmoytit baxxaqqa-le Astooti keenih luk temeete, tohuk lakal diggah keenik maggo mari farmoytit keenih temeetek lakal Baaxô bagul uma taamoomit caddok tatre mara yekken

Cagalah Yallaa kee kay farmoytah Qeebih ugteeh Baaxô bagul Sinam Qidimiiy maali Seelabut Baaxó baysa marih galto ken Qidee kee hinnay Qiddi ken heenih caxxat ken xinkiyeenih ken fannisee kee hinnay gaboobii kee ibitte ittal Hoxak migdi gabaa kee guri iba keenik Argaquk, hinnay baaxok ken xiiriyi, hinnay ken baaxol elle casbit ken hayi yakkeenimi, toh keenik addunyal xixxibisiyyaay wacarriysiyya, usun akeeral kaxxa digaala-lon
Kinnih immay tama marak isin ken tabbixeeniih ken digaaltaanak naharat wohut nadaamiteeniih Yallal gaceenik, Toysa Moominiiney diggah Yalli dambi Cabti-li xuwaw-li kinnim ixiga
Yeemeneh yan maraw Yallak meesitaay kay amri oggola, Yallat sin xayyossam gurrusaay kay gital ingicilliya kay jannatal yaffoofee mara takkeenimkeh

Diggah koroosite mari Baaxô bagul tanim inkih Yaalleenimil, wonnah tanim edde luk suginnoonuy diggah Qhiyaamah ayróh digaalâ fidah tet yaceenim faxaanamah Yalli keenik tet oggolak mananna, usun akeeral ken Qansarissa digaala-lon
